item.title: This has been left in woods, 26th June
item.description:
This garden waste and rubbish has been dumped again over night absolutely disgusting and there needs to be pollards put up so cars can’t access the wooded area . Such a shame as people can’t enjoy this space without dealing with dumped rubbish everywhere

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Wayside Green Open Space, Elmstead, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Rubbish dumped, 26th June
item.description:
I'm not sure if this rubbish has been dumped here or if when tenants left 527 (privately owned property but we don't have details of owner) they have left it, but it's getting worse as more bags are been accessed by animals. Spoke to bin man on June 24th who said to contact yourselves. Thank you

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Westhorne Avenue, Middle Park, London
